name: Dujanah
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.4GHz processor or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics should be fine Storage: 986 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.4GHz processor or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD dedicated graphics with 1GB VRAM Storage: 986 MB available space
